sentences.en: Alkalosis and potassium depletion may be pronounced.
sentences.cn: 可能有碱中毒和缺钾.

sentences.en: Calcium is also necessary to prevent leakage of potassium during the aging of beet slices.
sentences.cn: 甜菜薄片衰老时期,钙对于防止钾离子丧失,也极其必要.

sentences.en: Fruits, vegetables, and wholegrains are rich in potassium.
sentences.cn: 水果、蔬菜和全谷物富含钾元素。

sentences.en: Gunpowder is composed of sulfur, carbon, and potassium nitrate.
sentences.cn: 火药是由硫 、 碳和硝酸钾组成.

sentences.en: I let the silver nitrate react with pieces of brain hardened in potassium dichromate.
sentences.cn: 我让已被重铬酸钾硬化的一些脑组织细胞与硝酸银反应。

sentences.en: Pizza not only delivers lycopene, it also has calcium, potassium and complex carbohydrates.
sentences.cn: 馅饼不仅含有番茄红素，还有钙、钾和复合碳水化合物。

sentences.en: Potassium manuring may be less critical in continuous grass farming than in ley farming.
sentences.cn: 在多年生牧草地施用钾肥的迫切性比短期草地要小些.

sentences.en: Sodium and potassium are about the same in their chemical properties.
sentences.cn: 钠和钾的化学性质几乎是相同的.

sentences.en: The components of a potassium cycle vary greatly.
sentences.cn: 钾素循环的各个环节有很大的变化.

sentences.en: The first sign of potassium deficiency is a white speckling or freckling of the leaf blades.
sentences.cn: 缺钾的最初病症是叶片呈现白色斑痕或斑点.

sentences.en: The potassium content of foodstuffs is very variable.
sentences.cn: 食物中钾的含量差别很大。

sentences.en: The potassium hydroxide electrolyte is forced into the cells just before use.
sentences.cn: 在开始使用前把氢氧化钾电介质压入蓄电池.

sentences.en: The succession of uranium to potassium ratio anomalies is at about two - mile.
sentences.cn: 铀钾比值异常延伸约达2英里.

sentences.en: The usual counter - ions are sodium, potassium and ammonium.
sentences.cn: 反 离子通常是钠, 钾和铵.

sentences.en: These chemicals modulate the effect of potassium.
sentences.cn: 这些化学物质可以调节钾的功效。

sentences.en: They also contain a rich supply of vitamins A and C, folate, potassium, magnesium and fiber, which may reduce the risk of certain cancers.
sentences.cn: 他们还包含了丰富的维生素A和C ，叶酸，钾，镁，纤维，这些都是可以减少患有某些癌症风险的元素。

sentences.en: They are alumino - silicates of sodium . potassium and calcium.
sentences.cn: 它们都是钾和钙的铝硅酸盐类.

sentences.en: They are aluminosilicates of sodium, potassium and calcium.
sentences.cn: 它们都是钾和钙的铝硅酸盐类。

sentences.en: Tomatoes is a remarkable vegetable for your skin as it is high in vitamin A, vitamin C, and potassium.
sentences.cn: 您的皮肤来说西红柿是一个了不起的蔬菜，因为它富含维生素A ，维生素C ，和钾。

sentences.en: When wheat plants allowed to become deficient in potassium, pyruvate kinase activity increased.
sentences.cn: 当小麦植株令其缺钾时, 丙酮酸激酶活性随之升高.

trans.tran_en: a common soft silver-white metal that usually exists in combination with other substances, used for example in farming. It is a chemical element: symbol K
